name: Employee Twelve's Chaotic Break
description:
You are Employee Number 12.
It's time for your well-earned break, but your boss has other ideas!
Dodge the sharp objects, escape the office, and get on the leaderboard!

Coffee makes you faster!

Sharp things and pesky obstacles slow you down!

If you have performance issues please play the downloadable version

Uses SilentWolf for the online leaderboard: https://silentwolf.com/
